name: Cobalt-B
description: It's as keen as forced static observation upon various planes, with some strong luck to boot.

set.set_2: Increase damage against debuffed targets by **14%**/**16%**/**18%**/**20%**.
set.set_4: Restore **1** dodge attempt every **3** dodges. Dodge skills inflict burn upon hit, dealing damage equal to **24%**/**30%**/**36%**/**42%** of ATK every **0.5** seconds for **4** seconds.
